Board Fall 2016

    Wissem Gamra

    Brian Kitano

The YCS is a undergraduate organization that promotes talks, workshops and study breaks related to computer science and engineering on Yale campus.

Email felipe.pires@y[you know the rest].edu with questions or suggestions.

Copyright 2016. All rights reserved.
Join YCS

If you are interested in the work we do and would like to help us do more, you should consider joining our team. You can either:

  • come to our weekly dinners (JE dining hall, Wednesdays at 6pm) and see what we're up to, or
  • send a message to Felipe Pires saying you're interested in helping out.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
